newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sanyo Sec shares hit all-time low.
newsitem.headline: Sanyo Sec shares hit all-time low.

text.p: Shares of Sanyo Securities Co Ltd extended their losses to hit a record low in early afternoon trade on Thursday due to lingering worries about the brokerage's financial health, traders said.
The share price briefly hit a record low of 144 yen.
As of 0430 GMT, Sanyo's share price was down seven yen at 148 yen.

Sanyo's share price has been on a decline recently, as the brokerage has been asking life insurers for a delay in the repayment of their subordinated loans to Sanyo which come due at the end of July 1998.
Sanyo said on Thursday that it thinks that its request to life insurers for a delay in the repayment of the subordinated loans will be accepted.
"We think that our request will be accepted," said a Sanyo spokesman.
